languages.text: {n}Что-то переменилось в Ульфаре. Черты лица его стали суше и острее, а из веселого огонька в глазах пропала искренность. Он посуровел, и в голосе певца саг возникла траурная хрипотца.{/n} "Эттфатер, свидетель{mf||ница} {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}клятвы моей{/d}, с почтением встречаю тебя".

{n}Something has changed in Ulfar. His features have become starker, sharper, and the merry glint in his eyes has lost its sincerity. He is grimmer now, and his skjald's voice has gained a funereal hoarseness.{/n} "Aett-Vater, witness to {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}my oath{/d}, I greet you with honour."
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то переменилось в Ульфаре. Черты лица его стали суше и острее, а из веселого огонька в глазах пропала искренность. Он посуровел, и в голосе певца саг возникла траурная хрипотца.{/n} "Эттфатер, свидетель{mf||ница} {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}клятвы моей{/d}, с почтением встречаю тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar. His features have become starker, sharper, and the merry glint in his eyes has lost its sincerity. He is grimmer now, and his skjald's voice has gained a funereal hoarseness.{/n} "Aett-Vater, witness to my oath, I greet you with honour."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar. His features have become starker, sharper, and the merry glint in his eyes has lost its sincerity. He is grimmer now, and his skjald's voice has gained a funereal hoarseness.{/n} "Aett-Vater, witness to {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}my oath{/d}, I greet you with honour."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Algo ha cambiado en Ulfar. Sus rasgos son más afilados, más serios, y el brillo alegre de sus ojos carece de sinceridad. Es más lóbrego que antes y en su voz de skjald hay una ronquera fúnebre.{/n} «Aett-Vater, testigo de {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}mi juramento{/d}, le saludo con honor».
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar. His features have become starker, sharper, and the merry glint in his eyes has lost its sincerity. He is grimmer now, and his skjald's voice has gained a funereal hoarseness.{/n} "Aett-Vater, witness to {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}my oath{/d}, I greet you with honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo ha cambiado en Ulfar. Sus rasgos son más afilados, más serios, y el brillo alegre de sus ojos carece de sinceridad. Es más lóbrego que antes y en su voz de skjald hay una ronquera fúnebre.{/n} «Aett-Vater, testigo de mi juramento, le saludo con honor».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法身上发生了变化。他的五官变得更加冷硬、尖锐，眼中快乐的光芒也不再真挚。他变得更加阴沉，吟游诗人般的嗓音也喑哑得如同死人一般。{/n}“狼领，我{d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}誓言{/d}的见证人，我向你致以崇高的敬意。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar. His features have become starker, sharper, and the merry glint in his eyes has lost its sincerity. He is grimmer now, and his skjald's voice has gained a funereal hoarseness.{/n} "Aett-Vater, witness to {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}my oath{/d}, I greet you with honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法身上发生了变化。他的五官变得更加冷硬、尖锐，眼中快乐的光芒也不再真挚。他变得更加阴沉，吟游诗人般的嗓音也喑哑得如同死人一般。{/n}“狼领，我誓言的见证人，我向你致以崇高的敬意。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーの中の何かが変わった。彼の顔立ちはさらに精悍で鋭くなり、目の明るい輝きは誠実さを失った。その表情はますます険しく、スキャルドの声は陰鬱なかすれ声となった。{/n}「アエット＝ヴァテル、俺の{d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}誓い{/d}の証人。敬意を持ってあんたを迎え入れよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar. His features have become starker, sharper, and the merry glint in his eyes has lost its sincerity. He is grimmer now, and his skjald's voice has gained a funereal hoarseness.{/n} "Aett-Vater, witness to {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}my oath{/d}, I greet you with honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーの中の何かが変わった。彼の顔立ちはさらに精悍で鋭くなり、目の明るい輝きは誠実さを失った。その表情はますます険しく、スキャルドの声は陰鬱なかすれ声となった。{/n}「アエット＝ヴァテル、俺の{d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}誓い{/d}の証人。敬意を持ってあんたを迎え入れよう」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar vous apparaît changé. Ses traits sont encore plus durs et sévères qu'avant, et la lueur enjouée qui animait son regard a perdu sa sincérité. Il est plus sombre que jamais et sa voix de skjald revêt désormais des accents lugubres.{/n} « Aett-vater, témoin de {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}mon serment{/d}, je vous salue avec honneur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar. His features have become starker, sharper, and the merry glint in his eyes has lost its sincerity. He is grimmer now, and his skjald's voice has gained a funereal hoarseness.{/n} "Aett-Vater, witness to {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}my oath{/d}, I greet you with honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar vous apparaît changé. Ses traits sont encore plus durs et sévères qu'avant, et la lueur enjouée qui animait son regard a perdu sa sincérité. Il est plus sombre que jamais et sa voix de skjald revêt désormais des accents lugubres.{/n} « Aett-vater, témoin de mon serment, je vous salue avec honneur. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Irgendetwas hat sich an Ulfar verändert. Seine Züge sind schroffer geworden, schärfer, und das fröhliche Funkeln in seinen Augen hat seine Aufrichtigkeit verloren. Er ist nun grimmiger, und seine Skaldenstimme klingt rauer, trauriger.{/n} "Aett-Vater, bezeugt {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}meinen Eid{/d}, ich grüße Euch mit Ehre."
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar. His features have become starker, sharper, and the merry glint in his eyes has lost its sincerity. He is grimmer now, and his skjald's voice has gained a funereal hoarseness.{/n} "Aett-Vater, witness to {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}my oath{/d}, I greet you with honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Irgendetwas hat sich an Ulfar verändert. Seine Züge sind schroffer geworden, schärfer, und das fröhliche Funkeln in seinen Augen hat seine Aufrichtigkeit verloren. Er ist nun grimmiger, und seine Skaldenstimme klingt rauer, trauriger.{/n} "Aett-Vater, bezeugt meinen Eid, ich grüße Euch mit Ehre."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar. His features have become starker, sharper, and the merry glint in his eyes has lost its sincerity. He is grimmer now, and his skjald's voice has gained a funereal hoarseness.{/n} "Aett-Vater, witness to my oath, I greet you with honour."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'da bir değişiklik fark ediyorsun. Siması daha karamsar ve sert, gözlerindeki mutlu pırıltı ise içtenliğini kaybetmiş. Artık daha suratsız, skjald sesi de matemli bir boğukluk taşıyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}Yeminime{/d} şahit ol Aett-Vater. Seni onurla selamlıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar. His features have become starker, sharper, and the merry glint in his eyes has lost its sincerity. He is grimmer now, and his skjald's voice has gained a funereal hoarseness.{/n} "Aett-Vater, witness to {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Lone}my oath{/d}, I greet you with honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar'da bir değişiklik fark ediyorsun. Siması daha karamsar, sert ve gözlerindeki mutlu pırıltı içtenliğini kaybetmiş. Artık daha suratsız ve skjald sesi, matemli bir boğukluk taşıyor.{/n} "Yeminime şahit ol Aett-Vater. Seni onurla selamlıyorum."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
